oai_dc:dc.dc:title: CONSTRUCTION OF TWO NEW BREAKWATERS AT OSTEND LEADING TO AN IMPROVED HARBOUR ACCESS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Verhaeghe, Hadewych
Van Damme, Luc
Goemaere, Jan
De Rouck, Julien
Van Alboom, Wim
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: rubble-mound breakwater
harbour access
breakwater design
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The need of an improved harbour access resulted into the design of two new breakwaters in Ostend. The construction of the new breakwaters fits within the Integrated Coastal and Maritime Plan for Ostend. This paper describes the history, the extensive studies, the architecture and the construction works of the breakwaters. Finally future developments are considered.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 32 (2010): Proceedings of 32nd Conference on Coastal Engineering, Shanghai, China, 2010.; structures.53
